author: Lakshmi
text:
-@Rayyanist 
Happy Happy Happy Birthday you pyaaru hooman....
One of the kindest persons...The way you always try to make everyone's day with your words and cheer them up...
Letting them know how beautiful they are and lifting their spirits up...
It's a rare quality to find

author: Lakshmi
text:
As if I know to write pure Tamil...Illa pa...Avlo alavakkulam illa...
I learnt by pausing the movie subtitles,then matching it with English letters...😌
Bayapadhe..Idha naan padithen...
So heart touching...
One of the very few persons whom I have a right to show my rights... https://t.co/rKWda6WlTp
